content.Description: Your HubSpot private app API access token. See the docs for more details.
An array including an object entry for each column in your import file stream.
The format for dates included in the import file stream.
Used to indicate whether the import should create and update, only create, or only update records for a certain object or activity.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
